Main Content

Freshly Made for Everyone

Enjoy healthy living with simple & delicious food today.

Find a meal plan I know what I want

Why order from us?

Welcome to Eatology, we provide premium, tailor-made meal programs and deliver delicious, healthy, nutritionist approved food straight to your office or front door in Hong Kong. We have over 100 unique gourmet recipes that have been created to fulfill your specific health needs. Your meals are all bespoke to your unique requirements. Your meal then arrives in 2 working days or whenever you prefer. Enjoy our delivery service that will bring you healthy food straight to your doorstep no matter where you are in Hong Kong! Simple as that!

How Does it Work?

Choose a Program

Browse through our meal plans and select the diet that best fits your lifestyle or needs. We have over 100 unique gourmet recipes that have been created by certified nutritionists based in Hong Kong to fulfill your specific food and health needs. Otherwise, use the diet assessment tool to find your requirements!

see the menu

Fresh Food Delivered

Once we have received your order, we will prepare your food straight from our kitchen on the designated delivery date. Fresh and healthy food will arrive straight at your door every morning no matter where you are in Hong Kong!

see the menu

Dig in & Enjoy

Bon Appétit! Enjoy freshly cooked meals from Eatology that is filled with all the nutrition you need in every meal.

see the menu
